snippet: The opposition was locked in extended bartering over the creation of a more diverse yet unified umbrella organization, as President Bashar al-Assad warned against foreign intervention in a rare interview.
abstract: Syrian opposition is locked in bartering talks in Doha, Qatar, over creation of more diverse yet unified umbrella organization that backers hope will become credible alternative to Damascus government.
lead_paragraph: The opposition was locked in extended bartering over the creation of a more diverse yet unified umbrella organization, as President Bashar al-Assad warned against foreign intervention in a rare interview.

headline.seo: Syria Opposition Meets to Seek Unity
headline.main: Syrian Opposition Meets to Seek Unity
headline.print_headline: Syrian Opposition Meets to Seek Unity
